trans-unit.source: Represents an abstract base class from which all dynamic update notifications of changes to <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>s must be derived.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个抽象基类中的更改的所有动态更新通知<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>必须派生 s。

trans-unit.source: This class can be used by a tracking service to determine that <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s have been dynamically updated.
trans-unit.target: 此类可由跟踪服务用于确定<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>s 是否已动态更新。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>

trans-unit.source: The derived classes indicate which <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition> is being dynamically updated, and what operation is being performed (added to the workflow, removed from the workflow, or changed).
trans-unit.target: 派生的类指示<xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>是动态更新，以及将执行什么操作 （添加到工作流、 从流中移除或更改）。</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition>

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 派生类中实现时，初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to be changed.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取的名称<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref>要更改。

trans-unit.source: The name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> to be changed.
When overridden in a derived class, verifies that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction"></xref> is configured correctly and has no errors.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，验证<xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleConditionChangeAction"></xref>已正确配置且没有错误。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.Rules.RuleCondition"></xref> changes are occurring in.
